active_issue.title: [Web | Android] Manage Jars (Edit %, Name, Icon)
active_issue.body:
# üéØ Objective
Implement the "Manage Jars" feature to allow users to customize their 6 Jars system by editing jar names, percentages, icons, and colors.

## üìù Specifications
- [ ] **View Jar Details**: Tap on a jar to see full details and edit options
- [ ] **Edit Jar Name**: Allow renaming jars (e.g., "Necessities" ‚Üí "Bills & Rent")
- [ ] **Edit Percentage**: Adjust allocation percentage with validation (total must = 100%)
- [ ] **Edit Icon/Color**: Change jar icon and theme color
- [ ] **Reset to Default**: Option to restore default 6 Jars configuration
- [ ] **Persistence**: Save changes to local storage (mock) or backend

## üîó References
- **Feature ID**: `CORE-04` (See FEATURES.md)
- **Design Reference**: Jar card style from Dashboard
- **Default Jars**:
  | Jar | Default % | Purpose |
  | :--- | :---: | :--- |
  | Necessities | 55% | Essential expenses |
  | Education | 10% | Self-improvement |
  | Savings | 10% | Long-term savings |
  | Play | 10% | Entertainment |
  | Investment | 10% | Financial growth |
  | Give | 5% | Charity/gifts |

## üèóÔ∏è Implementation Guidelines
- **Web**: Modal or dedicated settings page with form inputs
- **Android**: Bottom sheet or separate Composable screen
- **Validation**: Real-time % validation showing remaining allocation
- **UX**: Show warning when total ‚â† 100%, disable save until valid
